name: abduco

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
abduco provides session management i.e. it allows programs to be run
independently from its controlling terminal. That is programs can be
detached - run in the background - and then later reattached. Together
with dvtm it provides a simpler and cleaner alternative to tmux or
screen.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
